author: Stephen Wilmot
title: 5G Coming Sooner, But Who Will Reap Benefits?
text:
The 5G era could come sooner than you think. Network builders should benefit—but at what price?
Finish technology group Nokia, which has focused on selling network gear and licensing its patent book since unloading its phone business to Microsoft in 2014, expects “full-scale rollouts of 5G networks” in 2019 and 2020. That’s a couple of years sooner than the industry was expecting a year ago. Trials suggest the U.S. and China will co-lead the charge.
...
